definitions.definition: The state of reduced consciousness during which a human or animal rests in a daily rhythm.
examples: We need to conduct an overnight sleep test to diagnose your sleep problem.

definitions.definition: An act or instance of sleeping.
examples: I’m just going to have a quick sleep .
There are only three sleeps till Christmas!

definitions.definition: Rheum , crusty or gummy discharge found in the corner of the eyes after waking, whether real or a figurative objectification of sleep (in the sense of reduced consciousness ).
A state of plants , usually at night, when their leaflets approach each other and the flowers close and droop, or are covered by the folded leaves.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The state of reduced consciousness during which a human or animal rests in a daily rhythm.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , informal ) An act or instance of sleeping.
( uncountable ) Rheum , crusty or gummy discharge found in the corner of the eyes after waking, whether real or a figurative objectification of sleep (in the sense of reduced consciousness ).
( botany ) A state of plants , usually at night, when their leaflets approach each other and the flowers close and droop, or are covered by the folded leaves.
